body_html: @hongsoog Thanks for following up! I will try that. Do you think this is just a Python version issue or do you think that Caffe2 is only working for you when you build from source? I haven't worked on this issue in a while, but I do remember trying a conda environment with Python 2.7.12 and still not being able to use the conda pre built package.

body: @hongsoog Thanks for following up! I will try that. Do you think this is just a Python version issue or do you think that Caffe2 is only working for you when you build from source? I haven't worked on this issue in a while, but I do remember trying a conda environment with Python 2.7.12 and still not being able to use the conda pre built package.
